feed.title: To My Pals
feed.subtitle: Sometimes you try and succeed, but rarely does that happen immediately. Keep moving forward.

entry.title: surround yourself with people who make you better

link.title: surround yourself with people who make you better

entry.content:
Surround yourself with people who make you a better person.

You want people who push you, make you stronger and get you out of your comfort zone. People that only make you feel good will hurt you in the long run and not help you to be better or push boundaries.
entry.summary: Surround yourself with people who make you a better person.

entry.title: Stay Away From Your Comfort Zone

link.title: Stay Away From Your Comfort Zone

entry.content:
Our comfort zone is where we are safe in life. Our real self is everything beyond that.

The Curiosity Zone is bigger than the Comfort Zone.

Every time you are curious, you punch another hole in that comfort zone.
entry.summary: Our comfort zone is where we are safe in life. Our real self is everything beyond that.

entry.title: You Make Decisions Every Day
entry.content: From the time you wake up until you go to sleep at night you make decisions. Be mindful of what decisions you are making. Are you helping your end goals? Are you just being reactive to everything? Don’t waste energy being reactive. Choose how you decide to act and decide outcomes based on adding good to the world, things good for yourself and others. The future you will thank you.
entry.summary: From the time you wake up until you go to sleep at night you make decisions. Be mindful of what decisions you are making. Are you helping your end goals? Are you just being reactive to everything? Don’t waste energy being reactive. Choose how you decide to act and decide outcomes based on adding good to the world, things good for yourself and others. The future you will thank you.
